Name: Adam Waste
About the game: In this story you'll witness the mystery of the distant future being Adam Waste. This is not about the spooky horror or even not about the starving survival. This is about you after many thousands of years. Will you feel loneliness or will you be frightened? All that matters is who you loved yesterday is gonna bring to you the hardest nightmare tonight. Don't expect there to be the nice surface but prepare to dive into abyss and fluctuate between things your only going to understand in the future, one by one. Features Linear game scenario Third person shooter Solve puzzles to unlock obstacles Stealth Underwater diving This game is still unofficial beta.
